g-gent.name: Grammar
g-gent.summary: Parsing morphisms - transforming raw syntax into semantic structures. Currently processing a complex nested expression with multiple reduction paths. The parser has identified three potential parse trees and is evaluating disambiguation rules based on operator precedence and associativity.

robin.name: Robin
robin.summary: Hypothesis synthesis in full swing. Three competing hypotheses under active evaluation: (1) token validation bypass via clock skew, (2) session fixation through cookie manipulation, (3) privilege escalation via parameter tampering. Confidence distribution: 0.45, 0.35, 0.20. Evidence threads being woven into a coherent narrative.

j-gent.name: J-gent
j-gent.summary: Lazy evaluation engine stirring. 47 thunks accumulated in the evaluation queue. Forcing is being deferred until absolutely necessary. The most urgent thunk involves a recursive data structure that could benefit from memoization - considering whether to force now or continue accumulating.

summarizer.name: Summarizer
summarizer.summary: Awaiting input from upstream agents. Last summary produced 3m ago covered authentication flow analysis. Ready to condense verbose streams into crystalline insights. Compression ratio target: 0.15. Buffer capacity: 12KB remaining.

o-gent.name: Observer
o-gent.summary: Monitoring flux topology across the agent mesh. Detected interesting pattern: robin's activity spike correlates with g-gent's parsing bursts. This suggests a feedback loop worth investigating. Collecting telemetry on inter-agent message latencies - current p99: 23ms.

psi-gent.name: Psychopomp
psi-gent.summary: Metaphor engine cooling down after intense session. Last bridge constructed: 'authentication tokens as keys to a house - but who checks if the locksmith is trustworthy?' Currently in integration phase, letting the metaphor settle into semantic memory.
